concept.title: 5225.7301-2 Solicitation approval for sole source contracts.

conbody.p: Submit requests for coordination with the Principal Director, DPC via DASN(P) by email at RDAJ&As.fct@navy.mil with the subject “[Activity Name] DFARS 225.7301-2 Coordination of Solicitation for Combined US/FMS FFP Sole Source Contracts for a Major System >$500M.”
